/usr/bin/c++     -pipe -m64 -fsigned-char -fPIC -pthread -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/main.dir/makepath.C.o  -o main  -L/opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib -rdynamic /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libCore.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libRIO.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libNet.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libHist.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libGraf.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libGraf3d.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libGpad.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libTree.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libRint.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libPostscript.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libMatrix.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libPhysics.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libMathCore.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libThread.so /opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib/libMultiProc.so -Wl,-rpath,/opt/cernroot/root_v6.08.00/lib
